whatWeDo.sectionTitle: What do we do at Third?
whatWeDo.intro1: We create digital solutions that change the way people and companies interact with the world.
whatWeDo.intro2: From virtual tours and simulators to artificial intelligence assistants and operational software, our work has a clear objective: to help you move forward with useful, precise, and powerful technology.
whatWeDo.highlight: It's not just about programming. It's about transforming.

whyWeDoIt.intro1: Because we understand that technology is no longer optional. It's the foundation to compete, grow, and adapt to a world that doesn't wait.
whyWeDoIt.intro2: At Third, we help organizations redesign processes, train their people, automate their operations, and connect with their customers in more effective and memorable ways.

pillar1.title: Software & Digital Transformation
pillar1.description: We develop robust, mobile, and scalable platforms tailored to your operation. We also guide you on your digital transformation journey with proven methodologies and strategic vision.
pillar1.examples: Industrial ERPs, health platforms, real estate CRMs, citizen portals, cloud migrations, ITIL compliance, and more.

pillar2.title: Artificial Intelligence Agents
pillar2.description: We create assistants and bots that automate tasks, serve customers, analyze information, and make decisions. We do this with advanced AI frameworks, integrations with existing systems, and multichannel conversational models.
pillar2.examples: Recruitment automation, customer service, medical triage, product recommenders, legal assistants, financial dashboards.

pillar3.title: Consulting & Fundraising
pillar3.description: We accompany you from idea validation to investor connections. We analyze your business model, prepare your pitch, and guide you through the fundraising process.
pillar3.examples: Business model validation, pitch deck preparation, investor connections, growth strategy, market analysis.

pillar4.title: Turnkey Solutions
pillar4.description: We deliver complete end-to-end projects: from concept to launch. We handle technology, design, infrastructure, and deployment.
pillar4.examples: Complete startups, enterprise platforms, immersive AR/VR experiences, integrated systems, ready-to-operate digital products.
